title: Looking for 1910/12 Sweet Caporal Pins (Large Letter Variation
author: taul166

posts.post_title: Looking for 1910/12 Sweet Caporal Pins (Large Letter Variation
posts.post_content:
Hi, if there is a better category to place this post let me know.

I am getting back to collecting this set, but am concentrating on the Large Letter Variation.  I don't currently have many.  If anyone has any for sale, please let me know either by private message or by email to [url]taul166@yahoo.com[/url].  Thanks.

posts.post_title: Re: Looking for 1910/12 Sweet Caporal Pins (Large Letter Variation
